name: Flick Kick Football Legends
summary:
Kick it old school with the latest game in the Flick Kick series — tackle, pass, shoot, and more!

Flick Kick Football Legends brings Flick Kick to all new heights with more diverse on-field gameplay, team building and management, and a multi-level league structure.

Packaged in a vibrant, comic-inspired style filled with lively characters, quirky scenarios, and rich animation, you will guide your team towards a highly sought after championship win to achieve legendary status.
